message: I think this is a fair split, Bob. What do you say?
I think this is a better split for me, Alice.
Let's split it evenly this time, Bob. It's getting risky to keep rejecting offers.
I'm still not convinced, Alice. You're getting the better end of the deal.
Okay, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more this time. Let's get this done before the money is worth nothing!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not backing down yet.
Bob, we're running out of time. This is my final offer. Let's settle this before we lose everything.
I'm not falling for it, Alice. I'll make the next offer count.
Bob, we're almost out of time! This is my last chance. Let's just end this now.
I'm not giving in, Alice. I'll get the better deal or nothing.
Bob, we're down to the wire. This is my last offer. If you reject it, we get nothing!
I'll take it all, Alice. I'm not leaving with nothing.
